DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether acupuncture effective safe therapeutic method treatment cervical pain , shoulder upper extremity pain discomfort due Whiplash associate disorder . ( Traumatic car accident ) We recruit 40 participant cervical , shoulder upper extremity pain discomfort due Whiplash associate disorder . And check initial data 40 participant ( Pain ; VAS , Cervical ROM , SF-36 , SDS , CMI ) 40 participant randomly allocate two group ; acupuncture group waiting-list group . Acupuncture group : participant give acupuncture treatment three time week 2 week , 15 minute session . After 6 time acupuncture treatment , check information participant 2 week ( VAS , ROM , SF-36 , SDS , CMI ) Waiting-list group : The waiting-list group receive acupuncture treatment . After 2 week check information participant ( VAS , ROM , SF-36 , SDS , CMI ) The waiting-Patients group permit receive usual care include physical therapy exercise permit take analgesic antiphlogistics trial period .
DOC.detailed_description: We recruit participant advertisement local newspaper homepage Kyung-hee Medical Centre December 8 , 2009 October 14 , 2010 . Patients meet eligibility criterion randomly allocate either acupuncture treatment group waiting-list group . Random sequence generate computerized number table . Allocation conceal use sealed envelope . According priority , seal envelope match patient give informed consent . The method acupuncture : participant give acupuncture treatment three time week 2 week , 15 minute ( Needle retention time ) session . ( Total 6 time ) We select ten acupuncture point - Local Acupoints : SI14 , SI15 , BL10 , BL12 , BL13 , BL14 , TE15 , GB20 , SI9 - Distal Acupoints : - Upper extremity : LU6 , LU7 , LU9 , LI11 , HT3 , SI2 , SI3 , SI5 , SI7 , PC4 , PC6 , TE5 - Lower extremity : SP3 , SP4 , BL59 , BL60 , BL61 , BL62 , BL66 , KI3 , KI4 , KI6 , KI7 , GB40 , GB41 , LR4 All Acupuncture point prepare 70 % alcohol pad , disposable stainless steel needle use . Most acupuncture insert vertically 1~2cm depth patient feel De-Qi . ( No additional stimulation )
DOC.criteria: The patient suffer cervical pain , limitation cervical ROM , discomfort sensation due traffic accident ( Whiplash associate disorder ) The patient effect 3 month orthopedical treatment . willing give permission approval . patient least 20 year age ( Both men , woman ) Cervical fracture Cervical spondylosis suspect malignant disease ( ex . tumor , stroke , etc ) suspect hemorrhagic disease infection disease , inflammatory disease unable communicate Korean The patient conscious disorder Any condition deem unsuitable trial evaluate Physicianincharge .
